title: Caged
description: "Someone tapped on my shoulder and I bunched them, shrugging off the touch with a grunt. I wasn’t in the mood for company. The light tap returned and had me spinning around angrily ready to plant my fist straight into a face. “What the fuck do you wa...” The words died in my throat, my eyes locked on twin chocolate brown orbs that I knew better than my own blue ones. I was struck dumb, stump stupid, unable to form words, just staring, trying to get my head out of my ass."Hard edged 22 year old up and coming MMA fighter James David Walker had it all four years ago before he destroyed his fledgling career and one of his closest friendships.With the help of his best friend Matt, JD has slowly begun to rebuild his life only to face another stumbling block, the return of Kylee Grace Parrish. The one woman he vowed to protect from himself and his demons. Will JD lose it all again or finally claim what he’s always wanted but never believed he deserved?
author: K. Pars
